data.message: I can't read my messages because I need messenger? There no option to refuse either?

replies.message: Hi Christian. We're confident Messenger is the way to provide a faster and more reliable experience. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2fpoVJB. -Joe
I just found this too and can't message I DONT WANT MESSENGER. I have an iPhone and have no room for any apps
Facebook I don't want that crappy app
Facebook Like I said in my comment above which no one from Facebook replied to, they just don't give a sh-t.  No one likes your messenger app and it's intrusive privacy issues.
Facebook Your confidence is massively flawed
Remember when it was one app, took up less space, didn't have features that forcibly reappear every time you disable them, and worked smoother? #thanksZuckerberg
Exactly one app into two apps. Don't even want that app itself waste of space. Now the show ads and two apps means more money for them. So greedy.
And I disable 'favorites', 'groups', and all the other idiotic features multiple times a day. STOP IT
Facebook no, it sucks. Literally everyone hates it
I still can't go to my messages lmao
"Customizable " shouldn't be temporary. Just let me keep my messages in chronological order and stop overcompartmentalizing everything.
Christian Romero you should message them. #ohwait
Sent a complaint with a picture of the issue can't even refuse it just says "you need messenger"
@Facebook....no one wants your app!!!
Go to options on facebook from your phone and choose "Desktop mode" and you can still use your messages :D You're welcome
Wow thanks dude 😌
I don't see it
If you have an android, click on the bottom left corner of your screen. Then,  go to Request desktop mode. Not sure on iPhone how it works. I just know for Samsung.
I don't have it and won't tolerate it... I refused when they first suggested it... I've heard nothing but complaints from my friends who were trapped into it...
Yea it only works with chrome ima download it just for that 😂
zsfehfwfy
Yes!!!! I don't want messenger and don't have space for another app that I don't want. WTF, @facebook!!!! Not happy. In fact, I've now deleted the Facebook app entirely. Way to go.
Benny nogood
good morning,,
